img_text: Troglodyte Niger WATSONVILLE RIOTS IN YOUR US HISTORY CLASSES? 火 elinel GET R F ALL FILIPINO IMAGES Refers to a type of chimpanzee called "Troglodyte Niger. The Troglodyte Niger settles mostly by caves and are very hairy with pal skin. When fully grown the Troglodyte Niger reaches from 3 to 5ft high, which is close to mans average height.
